title: Installation issue: hdf5
body:
Recursive variable setting in hdf5/example/Makefile when using both **szip** and LD_LIBRARY_PATH.
Occurs with **Intel compilers** where we need to **set LD_LIBRARY_PATH** (otherwise hdf5+fortran%intel fails).
I consider it is the HDF5 configure's logic that is wrong.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install hdf5@1.10.7%intel@2021.2~mpi+szip

=> hdf5: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> hdf5: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> hdf5: Executing phase: 'build'
==> hdf5: Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:

1 error found in build log:
     1434    make[1]: Entering directory '/tmp/cessenat/spack-stage/spack-stage-hdf5-1.10.7-wpzpl2r2wt2lh6ejreezdyctj36knkq4/spack-src/example
             s'
     1435    ../bin/mkdirs /home2/cessenat/Softs/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-zen2/intel-2021.2/hdf5-1.10.7-wpzpl2r2wt2lh6ejreezdyctj36kn
             kq4/share/hdf5_examples/c
     1436    Making install in src
     1437    Makefile:736: *** Recursive variable 'LD_LIBRARY_PATH' references itself (eventually).  Stop.
     1438    make[1]: Leaving directory '/tmp/cessenat/spack-stage/spack-stage-hdf5-1.10.7-wpzpl2r2wt2lh6ejreezdyctj36knkq4/spack-src/examples
             '
     1439    Makefile:1142: recipe for target 'install-examples' failed
  >> 1440    make: *** [install-examples] Error 1
```
### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
* **Spack:** 0.16.1-2393-418c78fdc9
* **Python:** 3.6.9
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu18.04-zen2
* **Concretizer:** original

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->
~/.spack/linux/compilers.yaml:
```
- compiler:
    spec: intel@2021.2
    paths:
      cc: /opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/2021.2.0/linux/bin/intel64/icc
      cxx: /opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/2021.2.0/linux/bin/intel64/icpc
      f77: /opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/2021.2.0/linux/bin/intel64/ifort
      fc: /opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/2021.2.0/linux/bin/intel64/ifort
    flags: {}
    operating_system: ubuntu18.04
    target: x86_64
    modules: [compiler/2021.2.0]
    environment:
      append_path:
        LD_LIBRARY_PATH: ${LD_LIBRARY_PATH}:/opt/intel/oneapi/compiler/2021.2.0/linux/compiler/lib/intel64_lin
```
### Additional information

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
